mapper.select: select comm_parent_code parentCode, comm_common_code commonCode, comm_name codeName from lms_common_code where comm_parent_code = #{value}

select B.comm_parent_code parentCode, B.comm_common_code commonCode, B.comm_name codeName from lms_common_code A, lms_common_code B where B.comm_parent_code = A.comm_common_code and B.comm_parent_code = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into lms_user (user_no, user_student_id, user_password, user_faculty_code, user_major_code, user_email, user_birth, user_name, user_gender) values (user_seq.nextval, #{studentId}, #{password}, #{faculty}, #{major}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{name}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select user_no userNo, user_student_id studentId, user_password password, user_name name, user_faculty_code facCode, user_major_code majCode, user_email email, user_birth birth, user_gender gender, user_is_graduated isGraduated, user_created_date createdDate, user_updated_date updatedDate from lms_user where user_student_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into lms_professor (prfs_no, prfs_professor_id, prfs_password, prfs_name, prfs_email, prfs_birth, prfs_gender, prfs_faculty_code, prfs_major_code) values (professor_seq.nextval, #{prfsId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{faculty}, #{major})
mapper.select: select prfs_no prfsNo, prfs_professor_id prfsId, prfs_password password, prfs_name name, prfs_email email, prfs_birth birth, prfs_gender gender, prfs_faculty_code faculty, prfs_major_code major, prfs_created_date createdDate, prfs_updated_date updatedDate from lms_professor where prfs_professor_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into lms_subject (sbj_no, prfs_no, sbj_division, sbj_quarter, sbj_major, sbj_subject, sbj_applied_credit, sbj_location, sbj_class_time, sbj_faculty, sbj_quota) values (subject_seq.nextval, #{prfsNo}, #{division}, #{quarter}, #{majCode}, #{sbjCode}, #{appliedCredit}, #{location}, #{classTime}, #{facCode}, #{quota})
